concept.title: Conditional processing (profiling)
concept.shortdesc: Conditional processing in DITA is based on metadata attributes in the DITA source.

draft-comment.author: Kristen J Eberlein
draft-comment.p: The following content was in the container topic for the DITAVAL elements. I think it should be edited, rephrased as a normative statement, and covered here:
Conditional processing code should provide a report of any attribute values encountered in content that do not have an action associated with them.

conbody.draft-comment: I'm less convinced it needs to be a normative statement. I think it can be a helpful addition to a processor, but it can also be a big annoyance. If anything about it is normative, I think it needs to be MAY, allowing processors to choose whether such notification is appropriate for their use cases.
